014package org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper;
015
016import java.sql.ResultSet;
017import java.sql.SQLException;
018import java.util.Arrays;
019import java.util.Optional;
020import java.util.function.BiPredicate;
021import java.util.function.Predicate;
022import java.util.stream.Stream;
023
024import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.JdbiCache;
025import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.JdbiCaches;
026import org.jdbi.v3.core.enums.DatabaseValue;
027import org.jdbi.v3.core.enums.EnumByName;
028import org.jdbi.v3.core.enums.EnumByOrdinal;
029import org.jdbi.v3.core.enums.Enums;
030import org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.exceptions.Unchecked;
031import org.jdbi.v3.core.result.UnableToProduceResultException;
032import org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.StatementContext;
033
034/**
035 * Column mapper for Java {@code enum} types.
036 * @param <E> the enum type mapped
037 *
038 * @see Enums
039 * @see EnumByName
040 * @see EnumByOrdinal
041 */
042// TODO jdbi4: move to enums package
043public abstract class EnumMapper<E extends Enum<E>> implements ColumnMapper<E> {
044    EnumMapper() {}
045
046    /**
047     * Map database string values to enum names.
048     *
049     * @param <E> the enum type to map
050     * @param type the enum type to map
051     * @return an enum mapper that matches on {@link Enum#name()}
052     */
053    public static <E extends Enum<E>> ColumnMapper<E> byName(Class<E> type) {
054        return new EnumByNameColumnMapper<>(type);
055    }
056
057    /**
058     * Map database integer values to enum ordinal values.
059     *
060     * @param <E> the enum type to map
061     * @param type the enum type to map
062     * @return an enum mapper that matches on {@link Enum#ordinal()}
063     */
064    public static <E extends Enum<E>> ColumnMapper<E> byOrdinal(Class<E> type) {
065        return new EnumByOrdinalColumnMapper<>(type);
066    }
067
068    static class EnumByNameColumnMapper<E extends Enum<E>> implements ColumnMapper<E> {
069        private static final JdbiCache<Class<? extends Enum<?>>, JdbiCache<String, Enum<?>>> BY_NAME_CACHE =
070                JdbiCaches.declare(e -> JdbiCaches.declare(
071                        name -> e.cast(getValueByName(e, name))));
072        private final Class<E> enumClass;
073
074        private EnumByNameColumnMapper(Class<E> enumClass) {
075            this.enumClass = enumClass;
076        }
077
078        @Override
079        public E map(ResultSet rs, int columnNumber, StatementContext ctx) throws SQLException {
080            String name = rs.getString(columnNumber);
081
082            return name == null || name.isEmpty() // some vendors treat null and empty varchar as the same
083                ? null
084                : enumClass.cast(BY_NAME_CACHE.get(enumClass, ctx).get(name, ctx));
085        }
086
087        private static Object getValueByName(Class<? extends Enum<?>> enumClass, String name) {
088            return Stream.concat(
089                        enumConstants(enumClass).filter(enumValueMatches(name, String::equals)),
090                        enumConstants(enumClass).filter(enumValueMatches(name, String::equalsIgnoreCase))
091                    )
092                    .findFirst()
093                    .orElseThrow(() -> new UnableToProduceResultException(
094                        String.format("no %s value could be matched to the name %s", enumClass.getSimpleName(), name)));
095        }
096
097        private static Predicate<Enum<?>> enumValueMatches(String name, BiPredicate<String, String> comparer) {
098            return e -> Optional.ofNullable(
099                Unchecked.function(e.getDeclaringClass()::getField)
100                    .apply(e.name())
101                    .getAnnotation(DatabaseValue.class))
102                .map(DatabaseValue::value)
103                .map(dbName -> comparer.test(dbName, name))
104                .orElseGet(() -> comparer.test(e.name(), name));
105        }
106
107        private static Stream<Enum<?>> enumConstants(Class<? extends Enum<?>> enumClass) {
108            return Arrays.stream(enumClass.getEnumConstants());
109        }
110    }
111
112    static class EnumByOrdinalColumnMapper<E extends Enum<E>> implements ColumnMapper<E> {
113        private final Class<E> enumClass;
114        private final E[] enumConstants;
115
116        private EnumByOrdinalColumnMapper(Class<E> enumClass) {
117            this.enumClass = enumClass;
118            this.enumConstants = enumClass.getEnumConstants();
119        }
120
121        @Override
122        public E map(ResultSet rs, int columnNumber, StatementContext ctx) throws SQLException {
123            int ordinal = rs.getInt(columnNumber);
124
125            try {
126                return rs.wasNull() ? null : enumConstants[ordinal];
127            } catch (ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException oob) {
128                throw new UnableToProduceResultException(String.format(
129                        "no %s value could be matched to the ordinal %s", enumClass.getSimpleName(), ordinal),
130                    oob, ctx);
131            }
132        }
133    }
134}
